txt.en:
The enemy has sent a group of Orcs and trolls to destroy the ballistae on the tower above the gate-house and to breach the last fortifications along the walkway to the Hornburg. The ballistae and barricades have served to aid in the defence of the fortress and will be a heavy loss if destroyed by the enemy.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Ballista structurally damaged
- Barricade structurally damaged

<rgb=#FF0000>Minor Merit Loss:</rgb>
- Rohirrim guard defeated
Defeat the enemies assaulting the barricades and ballistae protecting the Hornburg. Aragorn will aid in the defence, but if he or the blockade fall, the Hornburg will surely be lost to your foes.
Do not let the final barricades become destroyed ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
